#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,sum,flag;
    char ch;
    string s;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        vector<int>v1;
        vector<string>v2;
        sum=0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        while(n--)
        {
            cin>>s>>ch;
            flag=0;
            for(i=0;i<v2.size();i++)
                {
                    if(v2[i]==s)
                {
                    flag=1;
                    if(ch=='+')
                        v1[i]=1;
                    else
                        v1[i]=-1;
                    break;
                }
                }

            if(flag==0)
            {
                v2.push_back(s);
                if(ch=='+')
                    v1.push_back(1);
                else
                    v1.push_back(-1);
            }
        }
        for(i=0;i<v1.size();i++)
            sum+=v1[i];
        printf("%d",sum);
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
